pullRequest.title: Fix duplicate event listeners in TemplateRenderer
pullRequest.bodyText:
in case where the element is attached several times during the same roundtrip.
Fixes vaadin/vaadin-grid-flow#837
With these changes, the event listener is added synchronously instead of beforeClientResponse, so that it gets removed before the next attach.
Also, fixed a minor memory leak: The detach listeners were never removed, so re-attaching a component with template renderers was accumulating redundant listeners (see the third commit).

nodes.bodyText: Let me know if there's any better way to "listen once".

There is Registration.once(Command) : Registration for "run only once" and Registration.combine(Registration...) : Registration to combine which I suppose you could utilize if you want to ?
(I'm not sure if using those makes the code cleaner, you can take a look but not going to block for this)
